mapper.insert: insert into priority.work_priority_order_mst (company_cd, priority_order_cd,priority_order_name, product_power_cd,author_cd,create_time,editer_cd,edit_time,shelf_pattern_cd,attr_option) values (#{list.companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER},concat('一時保存データ',#{date}), #{list.productPowerCd,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{authorCd},now(),#{authorCd},now(),#{list.shelfPatternCd},#{list.attrOption})

insert into priority.work_priority_order_mst(company_cd, priority_order_cd,priority_order_name,attr_option, product_power_cd,author_cd,create_time,editer_cd,edit_time,shelf_pattern_cd) select company_cd, priority_order_cd,concat('一時保存データ',#{date}),attr_option, product_power_cd,author_cd,now(),editer_cd,now(),shelf_pattern_cd from priority.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd =#{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select priority_order_cd as priorityOrderCd, priority_order_name as priorityOrderName from priority.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by priority_order_cd desc

SELECT product_power_cd,array_to_string(array_agg(pat.shelf_pattern_cd),',') as shelf_pattern_cd,cast(array_to_string(array_agg( DISTINCT pmst.shelf_name_cd),',') as integer ) as shelfNameCd FROM priority.priority_order_mst mst inner join priority.priority_order_pattern pat on mst.priority_order_cd=pat.priority_order_cd inner join planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst pmst on pmst.shelf_pattern_cd = pat.shelf_pattern_cd where mst.priority_order_cd =#{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by product_power_cd

select priority_order_cd as id,priority_order_name as fileName,author_cd as authorName,create_time as createTime,true as flag from priority.work_priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd} and author_cd = #{authorCd} and create_time = (SELECT max(create_time) from priority.work_priority_order_mst where author_cd =#{authorCd}) union all (select priority_order_cd as id,priority_order_name as fileName,author_cd as authorName,create_time as createTime, false as flag from priority.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd} and deleteflg = 0 and author_cd = #{authorCd} order by priority_order_cd desc)
select product_power_cd,shelf_pattern_cd from priority.work_priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, pattern.shelf_pattern_cd,shelf_pattern_name from priority.priority_order_pattern pattern inner join priority.shelf_pattern_mst patternmst on patternmst.shelf_pattern_cd=pattern.shelf_pattern_cd inner join priority.shelf_pts_data pts_data on pts_data.shelf_pattern_cd=pattern.shelf_pattern_cd where priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd} and pattern.company_cd=#{companyCd}
